Package org.mcavallo.opencloud.filters

Interface Summary
Filter<E> Interface that defines a generic object filter.
 

Class Summary
AcceptAllFilter<E> Filter that accepts all objects.
AcceptNoneFilter<E> Filter that doesn't accept any objects.
AndFilter<E> Logical AND of two or more filters
DictionaryFilter Filters tags with names contained in a given list of terms.
FilterBase<E> Base class for object filters.
LengthFilter Filters tags with length not contained between a minimum and a maximum value
MaxLengthFilter Filters tags with length greater than a defined value
MinLengthFilter Filters tags with length lower than a defined value
NonNullFilter<E> Filter that accepts all non-null objects.
NotFilter<E> Accept all not null objects
OrFilter<E> Logical OR of two or more filters
RegExFilter Filters tags that don't match a given regular expression
TagFilter Tag filters base class
